block.p: DURANTE-Carl. 76, of Hasbrouck Heights, NJ on April 19. Beloved husband of Mary. Loving father of Mary, Michael and Mark. Devoted grandfather of Christopher Durante, Katharine and Michael O'Donnell, Matthew Durante. Brother of Theresa Gulotta, Regina Stavola. Funeral Mass 11 AM, Corpus Christi R.C. Church. Interment St. Theresa Mausoleum Summit. Visiting Sunday, 2-4 and 79, Hennessey-Powell, 232 Kipp Ave., Hasbrouck Heights. For information call 201-288-1362.
